notes.value: Line items now support tax calculations
notes.caption: Line items now support tax calculations
Fixed date formatting bug selecting dates from mobile
Added ability to create PDF exports for invoices
Added ability to print invoices with multiple watermarks, send selected invoice via email of your choice.
